AULRBQ.en:
[Worldcup Guide]
Hey, don't you know the news?
the world wide ^8B4513Football Festival^000000
will be held soon!!
Moreover, we are distributing you
some festival items,
so take it and feel the atmosphere!
AULRBQ.pt:
[Worldcup Guide]
Hey, don't you know the news?
the world wide ^FF5555Football Festival^000000
will be held soon!!
Moreover, we are distributing you
some festival items,
so take it and feel the atmosphere!

BULRBQ.en:
[Worldcup Guide]
I guess it's the first time for you
to participate in ^8B4513Football Festival^000000!
Here you are~!
This is ^006400a Worldcup Hat^000000
and it's free for the worldcup-rookie like you.
So choose what you want!
BULRBQ.pt:
[Worldcup Guide]
I guess it's the first time for you
to participate in ^FF5555Football Festival^000000!
Here you are~!
This is ^3355FFa Worldcup Hat^000000
and it's free for the worldcup-rookie like you.
So choose what you want!

SkLRBQ.en:
[Worldcup Guide]
Plus, I heard that
you can get some special present
if you bring ^006400Football^000000 and ^006400Soccer Shoes^000000
from the ^0000FFWorldcup Manager^000000.
Then, enjoy the festival~!

Because it means that person
truly enjoyed the festival. Not you~!

UELRBQ.en:
[Worldcup Manager]
Hello~
Are you enjoying
the football festival?
How may I help you?

[Worldcup Manager]
Hello~

the football festival?

UULRBQ.en: I want a Worldcup Hat of Honor.
UULRBQ.pt: I want a Worldcup Hat of Honor.

UkLRBQ.en:
[Worldcup Manager]
If you want to get a ^006400Worldcup Hat of Honor^000000,
you need to bring a ^006400Football^000000 
and ^006400Soccer Shoes^000000.
You can get those items
from ^0000FFWorldcup Guide^000000.
So just you can ask him.

U0LRBQ.en:
[Worldcup Manager]
Here~! ^006400Worldcup Hat of Honor^000000!
It will lasts for 24 hours
after opening the box
and then it will disappear~!
